oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WAVE, TURBULENT AND MEAN MOMENTUM FLUXES ACROSS THE BREAKING WAVE TRANSITION REGION IN THE SURF ZONE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thieke, R.J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: surf zone
wave transition
breaking waves
momentum flux
turbulent flux
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents an application to the transition region of an integral momentum conservation model incorporating a Reynolds type decomposition for both wave and turbulent fluctuations. With simple parameterizations the model provides both a rough predictive capability for the limiting wave reduction across the transition zone and also an alternative means of examining the partitioning of flow momentum across the region.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 23 (1992): Proceedings of 23rd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Venice, Italy, 1992.
